title: After Dark: Xtra Loud featuring "Hélio Oiticica—To Organize Delirium"
description:
Secure a ticket to this special edition of After Dark, featuring legendary psychedelic pop group Os Mutantes and the exhibition Hélio Oiticica: To Organize Delirium. Your ticket includes access to the insider’s talk and late-night experience with special guest performances. Attendees must be 21+, and valid ID is required upon entry.

INSIDER’S TALK
8:00–9:00 (Doors open at 7:30)
Rubloff Auditorium—230 South Columbus Drive
Start the evening with acclaimed Os Mutantes leader Sérgio Dias in conversation with Jim DeRogatis and Greg Kot, hosts of Sound Opinions. Discover the artists and musicians of the Tropicália movement before you see the exhibition.

LATE-NIGHT EXPERIENCE
9:00–12:00
Modern Wing—159 East Monroe Street
Head to Griffin Court for special tours of Hélio Oiticica, a Tropicália-inspired DJ set by recess, complimentary appetizers, and cocktails from a cash bar. Top off the night with a show-stopping performance from Os Mutantes.

This event is hosted by the Evening Associates. Follow the Evening Associates on Facebook for the latest news on After Dark and other events.

#AfterDarkChi @ArtInstituteEA
